lyrics:
Bechain kyu main hone laga hoon
Tere liye iss tarah
Hai ek dil bhi jeene ko kaafi
Kyu chahiye dusra

Teri har saans ko bata de
Haq inpe hai bas mera
′Gar ye baat sun raha hai wo khuda

Tera main intezaar hoon kar raha, kar raha
Tujhi se phir bhi pyaar hoon kar raha
Tera main intezaar hoon kar raha, kar raha
Tujhi se phir bhi pyaar hoon kar raha

Sach kaha tha kisi ne, "ek dafa zindagi mein
Ishq hota hain dil Ko, haan, kisi na kisi se"
Yaar, jite hai aashiq kis tarah door hoke?
Kyu kabhi ye kisi ko na bataya kisi ne?

Ek din tu nazar jhukake
Phir raahon ko dekhna
Mere aansoo gire milenge har jagah

Tera main intezaar hoon kar raha, kar raha
Tujhi se phir bhi pyaar hoon kar raha
Tera main intezaar hoon kar raha, kar raha
Tujhi se phir bhi pyaar hoon kar raha

snippet: Tera main intezaar hoon kar raha, kar raha
